title: somone went on my acount and used my rp
body: riot somone has used my account to get a champ now I have no rp

replies.body: Since there's no way of knowing whether or not us simply used another computer to undergo the transaction, Riot will most likely only provide you with security counter-measures so as to eliminate or minimize the chances of this happening again. as for now, here is something to hopefully make u happy{{item:2054}}  Diet Poro Snax :D
